title: Jimbos Protocol turns to law enforcement after hacker ignores $800K bounty
description:
Jimbos Protocol said May 31 that the hacker responsible for a recent attack has not responded to its bounty offer and it will now turn to law enforcement. The protocol was hacked for 4000 Ethereum (ETH), or roughly $7.5 million, via a flash loan exploit on May 28. Jimbos Protocol tweeted: ” We’ve spoken about […]

The post Jimbos Protocol turns to law enforcement after hacker ignores $800K bounty appeared first on CryptoSlate.
